feed.title: WagmiOS Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WagmiOS: wagmi containerized!
entry.content:
v2.0.0 is the latest stable version of WAGMI

  • thanks to the great people at /r raspberrypi for their feedback. I decided to make the full switch to a containerized version.

  • No need to install anything to your system in the backend. just docker üê≥ (if you still want the older version it is tagged for use)

Updates:

  • light mode!
  • containerized version
  • added ports to container view
  • made some styling changes to make it easer to see buttons in light mode
  • smaller footprint
